snippet.title: urban lockdown
snippet.description:
Experience the intense thriller where a notorious crime boss, finally captured after a harrowing assault attempt, masterminds a daring prison escape to seize control of the city. When he dispatches his unreliable right-hand man to retrieve the key witness—his intended victim's brother arrives, determined to end his reign of terror once and for all.

Written, edited, and directed by Andrew Thatcher, this gripping narrative unfolds with heart-pounding action and suspense.

🎮 Explore the Official Videogame Tie-In!
Immerse yourself further in the world of "Urban Lockdown" with the official videogame, available on Steam, itch.io, and Gamejolt. Developed by Thatcher Productions.

🌐 Discover More at Thatcher Productions
Visit our website for exclusive content and updates: www.thatcherproductions.org

Prepare for an unforgettable journey into the heart of justice and revenge. Don’t miss out—watch now!
